title: Patchwork Coverlet, 1830–50
medium:
Medium: wool
Technique: patchwork of machine-stitched roller printed squares
description: Unmade quilt of approximately 144 squares of challis wool (5 x 5 in.) stitched together to form a large square. In pastel and faded colors, either small allover geometric, floral patterns or a variety of stripes. There are a few duplicates.

tombstone.epitaph:
Patchwork Coverlet, 1830–50. Medium: wool
Technique: patchwork of machine-stitched roller printed squares. 1960-73-2.
